Text:
Incredable- i just downloaded game, copyed everything and pasted in the right location, patched by doubleclicking on game icon and then replaced the game icon with this one and it worked....
 IT WORKS!
i need have version 1.7.1 to apply this update?
This is the crack only, launch the game and let it update to v1.8.0 before applying the crack.

The two DLC don't seem to work!

Using the Skidrow 1.71 crack makes these available again after applying the 1.80 patch.
